ygData.subject: Re: new here...used to play eq
ygData.msgSnippet: Get what ya want... but Xbox outdated? Nah... it s a better machine than many PC s out there, with better hardware, and video functions. In general that
ygData.messageBody:
Get what ya want... but Xbox
outdated?<br><br>Nah... it's a better machine than many PC's out there,
with better hardware, and video functions. In general
that is. And it's specifically all devoted for gaming.
I've seen Xbox graphics for things like Soul Calibur
2, and a few other RPGs and been sorely tempted to
get one but no $$$ available unfortunately and I
don't spend what I don't have yet (unless it's an
emergency )<br><br>Gamecube has one game that I look at to
make me wonder if Mario, and Metroid aren't going to
make a come back. That game is Rogue Squadron. Star
Wars is aways big but the nice user interface coupled
with the graphics and immensity of the game promises
well. If the other games are anything
close...<br><br>shooman out (late for classes again... lol)
